question_text: What is a safe practice when working near a buildingâ€™s electrical system?
answer_options: Use the ground wire to protect yourself
Connect a wrist strap to the building ground
Avoid connecting yourself to any part of the building's electrical system
Discharge yourself on a live outlet
correct_answer: Avoid connecting yourself to any part of the building's electrical system
explanation: Even the ground wire can be energized; never connect yourself to any part of the building's electrical system.
